org.sql: SELECT SUM(organizations.unspent_credits_count) FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT SUM(organizations.unspent_credits_count) FROM organizations INNER JOIN organization_memberships ON organizations.id = organization_memberships.organization_id WHERE organization_memberships.user_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
